cs310.visualization
Class VGraphWindow<V,E>

java.lang.Object
  cs310.visualization.VGraphWindow<V,E>
Type Parameters:
V - vertex type
E - edge type
public class VGraphWindow<V,E>
extends java.lang.Object

Set up a Swing window and a VisualGraph for a given JGraphT graph, and display it. The vertices will be displayed around a circle, and the edges between. The client can go on to edit the VisualGraph via its API, if desired. The end user can move the vertices around on the screen.

Author:
eoneil
